1.1.2.1.5. shapepipe.pipeline.file_handler module¶

FILE HANDLER

This module defines a class for handling pipeline files.

Author:Samuel Farrens <samuel.farrens@cea.fr>
shapepipe.pipeline.file_handler.check_dir(dir_name)[source]¶

Check Directory

Raise error if directory exists.

Parameters:dir_name (str) – Directory name
Raises:OSError – If directory already exists
class shapepipe.pipeline.file_handler.FileHandler(run_name, config)[source]¶

Bases: object

File Handler

This class manages the files used and produced during a pipeline run.

Parameters:
  • run_name (str) – Run name
  • config (CustomParser) – Configuaration parser instance

Run Directory

This method defines the run directory

_get_files_by_ext(path, ext)[source]¶

Get Files by Extension

This method retrieves file names from a given path with a given file extension.

  • ext (str) – File extension
Returns:

List of file names
Return type:

list
Raises:

RuntimeError – For empty file list
